resources.string: In the shadows, the mafia has awakened.\nWill you survive the chaos?
The Godfather stays in the shadows, commanding every move with cold precision while others carry out his deadly will.
As a loyal Mafia member, you gather under the veil of night to silently choose who will not survive until morning.
Each night you quietly defy death, selecting one person to protect and hoping your instincts are faster than a killer’s blade.
Under cover of darkness, you investigate one soul each night, hunting for truth before the enemy hunts you down first.
You hold no special power but your voice, standing against the unknown with courage, suspicion, and sheer will to survive.
With one bullet and no forgiveness, you wait for the perfect moment to take a life and pray you chose the right target.
You strike without blood, silencing a voice each night and watching the town crumble under confusion and fear.
You walk among them with a smile, hiding the chaos inside until the moment comes to take them all down in flames.
Wearing unseen armor, you withstand a deadly blow once, but after that you’re just another name on the list.
Your vote hides in plain sight, ready to be revealed when the stakes are high enough to change the town’s destiny.
If death comes, you don’t leave empty-handed — your final vision uncovers one truth before you disappear forever.
You thrive on madness, winning only if they vote you out, so play the fool and let them hand you your twisted victory.
You corrupt from within, converting one mind at a time until the town realizes — too late — that it belongs to you.
Puts a magical bracelet on you that blocks the next elimination attempt. Only works once.
Silences all accusations against you in the next phase. No one can vote or defend against you.
Swap your identity with another player, redirecting all current votes to them.
Grants you one secret vote at the end of the round, possibly changing the outcome.
Number of roles must match player count, and Mafia must be fewer than non-Mafia
At least 5 players are required to start the game
